body.content:
Hello Dear

 From the Department for International Trade China, the Government of
China is giving you a lifetime benefiting Loan opportunity, In 2013
China overtook the United States to become the world largest Trading
Nation. Today the Chinese government, in a strong move to support
Trade as the biggest source of the Country Economy and to maintain
their position as the 2nd largest Economy in the world is offering you
a personal/company loan. The Government of China is offering you
Amount of ($3,000,000.00) Three Million United States Dollars to
Amount of ($20,000,000.00) Twenty Million United States Dollars with a
low interest loan of 1% annually. Loan repayment is from 3 years to 6
years.

    LOAN REQUIREMENT
    1) Full Name and Address
    2) Telephone Number and Email Address
    3) Identification Card ( National ID Card, Driver's License or
International Passport )
Only acceptable
    4) Loan Amount

We are ready to finance advanced stage projects requiring such
support. If you have fund management abilities, credible projects in
need of funding or advanced stage projects requiring money; we will be
delighted to work with you. Email:

    I am Mr. Zhao Zhiyan
    Loan processor
    Telephone: +8616521687834
